getCurlCmd

java.lang.String getCurlCmd()
brief:
Will use "-ki" as default curl parameters
Returns:
a cURL command with "-ki" set as default parameters

getCurlCmd

java.lang.String getCurlCmd(java.lang.String curlParams)
brief:
@param String curlParams - Pass the curl parameters. If "" is used then no params will be added to the command line
Returns:
A cURL command with custom parameters
